name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a Senior Frontend Engineer with 8 years of experience, I specialize in leveraging **React**, **TypeScript**, and **Next.js** to create high-performance applications. My expert knowledge in **Tailwind** enhances my ability to design responsive and elegant user interfaces while implementing A/B testing and feature flags for optimized user experiences. In addition to my frontend capabilities, I have a strong foundation in modern engineering practices and UX design, ensuring that applications are not only functional but also intuitive and user-friendly.

My tech stack includes a diverse range of technologies such as **Python**, **Flutter**, **Node.js**, as well as backend frameworks like **FastAPI** and **Django**, and robust cloud experience across **Azure** and **AWS**. Furthermore, I have led the development of enterprise-grade platforms integrating AI/ML capabilities for data processing and automation, ensuring compliance with standards including HIPAA and PCI DSS. My background in microservices architecture and CI/CD automation further supports my ability to deliver secure and scalable solutions.
